name: Barista Simulator - PRE ALPHA
description:
Join the Discord!

if you play please fill this https://forms.gle/UTAwX6m7VBJ7mGqp8

#thirdwave

This is a free vertical slice prototype of the in-development game coming to PC and consoles! We want players feedback early on in development to iterate and make sure the game is fun to play. Join the discord and let us know what is brewing!

The game aims to simulate what a barista job is, from tasting coffee, to sourcing, to brewing all the way to managing the café and growing it! 

Our mission is to create awareness about the third wave in coffee. Coffee is more than caffeine!
